Desc.entry: The society works to preserve and restore all aspects of the agricultural heritage of the Moss Valley. Most members specialise in tractors, barn engines and vehicles. Meetings normally involve a guest speaker, DVD or film show. Also organises 2 rallies each year as well as outings to places of interest.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Mon in the month at 8pm (except July and August)
